      • getFitness

        public double getFitness()
        Specified by:
        getFitness in interface Generational

      • setFitness

        public int setFitness()
        Sets the fitness value of the individual. In this context, the fitness is the number of conflicts ( how many queens can attack each other). So the lower the fitness, the better.
        Returns:
        the number of conflicts

      • sequentialIntegers

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> sequentialIntegers​(int n)
        Initializes a non sequential genome made by the integers from 0 to n. The genome is valid for the N Queen problem.
        Parameters:
        n - the size N
        Returns:
        Individual's arraylist

        Parameters:

        adjMap - The initialized adjacency map

      • edgeRecombination

        public static Individual edgeRecombination​(Individual parent1,
                                           Individual parent2,
                                           java.util.Random rand)
        Creates a new individual, reorganizing the genome of the parents with the Edge Recombination operator.
        Parameters:
        parent1 - The first parent
        parent2 - The second parent
        rand - The random generator
        Returns:
        newly generated Individual

      • swapMutation

        public Individual swapMutation​(double mut,
                               java.util.Random rand)
        Cycles through the genome of the individual and swaps , or not, each allel with a random one, depending on the probability,
        Parameters:
        mut - the mutation probability
        rand - the Random generator
        Returns:
        the mutated Individual

      • getAdjacentEdge

        public static int getAdjacentEdge​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> adjMap,
                                  int node,
                                  java.util.Random rand)
        Selects the next edge node to add to map prioritizing shortest adjacency list and common edges. Otherwise it's chosen at random.
        Parameters:
        adjMap - adjancy map
        node - current node
        rand - random generator
        Returns:
        the next edge to add the the path.

      • getAvailableNode

        private static int getAvailableNode​(Individual parent,
                                    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> used,
                                    java.util.Random rand)
        Returns a random node from the list of available nodes. To get this list the original list will all nodes is cloned, and the used nodes are removed from it.
        Parameters:
        parent - The Individual parent
        used - The list of used nodes
        rand - The random generator
        Returns:
        the chosen available node
